title: Fix stalled-deal rule: avoid false positives for “no next meeting scheduled” in sales_followup_recommendations

sections.text: Stalled-deal alerts are incorrectly triggering “no next meeting scheduled” even when a future meeting exists in CRM/calendar data. Update the rule evaluation to consider upcoming meetings across synced sources (CRM events + calendar-linked meetings) and to ignore canceled/no-show events. Add a small set of unit/integration tests covering common edge cases (rescheduled meetings, timezones, and missing event IDs) to prevent regressions.
